attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we are demanding that the uk goverment should stop treating children like crimnals,stop detaining babies,most of these innocent babies are born here and should not be deported,how will it feel like if your kids were treated inhumamly because you are seeking protection in a different country.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
